assetRequirements.purpose: main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Лондон in autumn
assetRequirements.visual_style: warm tones with cozy elements reflecting British culture
assetRequirements.content_context: A picturesque view of London in autumn showcasing parks, pubs, and cultural landmarks

assetRequirements.purpose: to highlight autumn activities and festivals in London
assetRequirements.visual_style: vibrant autumn colors with festival elements
assetRequirements.content_context: Images of autumn festivals, coffee with a view of Big Ben, and cozy pub scenes

usageInstructions.placement: Place according to campaign layout requirements
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Откройте для себя осенний Лондон!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
usageInstructions.accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected This seasonal image will highlight autumn festivals and activities in London, enhancing the excitement and inviting nature of the campaign.". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
usageInstructions.fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
